title: Casa Baja
subtitle: My house in Budapest
description: My home for 3 months during which I wrote my first lines of HTML and CSS

title: Linguarum
subtitle: Startup of internship
description: The place that inspired me to start coding. 11/10, would intern again there

title: Erzsébet-kilátó
subtitle: Elisabeth Lookout
description: The Elizabeth Lookout is a historic lookout tower on János hill above Budapest. Built in 1911, the tower was named after Empress Elisabeth, wife of Emperor Franz Joseph I. Frigyes Schulek was the architect. With 527 meter the János hill is the highest point of Budapest.

title: Gellért-hegy
subtitle: Gellért Hill
description: Gellért Hill is a 235 m (771 ft) high hill in the 1st and 11th district of Budapest. At the top of the hill is the Citadella (Citadel), from which a view is available down both directions of the Danube.
